Class GUIDinamic

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • it.polimi.deib.provaFinale2014.francesco1.corsini_gabriele.carassale.view.GUIDinamic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TypeOfInteraction, ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Accessible, RootPaneContainer, WindowConstants

    public class GUIDinamic
extends JFrame
implements TypeOfInteraction
    Classe principale per la GUI Dinamica. Questa classe fa da raccoglitore di tutti gli oggetti.
    Author:
    Francesco Corsini
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GUIDinamic

        public GUIDinamic(ConnectionClient connectionClient)
        Constructor that initializes the GUI. It creates the BufferedImageContainer that is the container of all the game pictures
        Parameters:
        connectionClient - the one that the GUI uses to send back the commands
